comment_text:
I always thought the best way to negotiate is to have the freedom to walk away. (BATNA - Best Alternative To Negotiated Agreement)

Your boss doesn't give you a raise - you find another job.

(If you can't find a higher salary elsewhere, what reason is there for your boss to offer more?)

You're in salary negotiations for a potential new job, they don't offer enough - stay at your current job.

You're interviewing when you have a job and the interviewer is being a tremendous douchebag - walk out.
author: fsk
story_title: Ask a Hostage Negotiator: What's the Best Way to Get a Raise?
